definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: The beach life-guards usually flag one another for communication.
sentences.chinese: 海滨救生员通常用旗号传达信息。

sentences.english: Correlation and path analysis for 16 traits of Kosteletzkya virginica was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 对海滨锦葵的16个数量性状进行了相关和通径分析。

sentences.english: Qingdao is a beautiful seaside city. It lies in the east of Shandong Province.
sentences.chinese: 青岛是一个美丽的海滨城市，它位于山东省的东部。

sentences.english: Vendors' stalls crowd the beachside road in Pattaya.
sentences.chinese: 在芭堤雅，售货摊挤满了海滨区的道路。

sentences.english: Extraoral vast shoals of the Pearl River waterfront, the underwater beach off the coast to slow gradient.
sentences.chinese: 珠江口外海滨滩涂辽阔，水下滩地向岸外缓慢坡降。

sentences.english: Dalian Medical University campus is located in the new South Waterfront Lushun the middle of tourist belt.
sentences.chinese: 大连医科大学新校园位于旅顺南路海滨观光带的中段。

sentences.english: They took a shortcut to go on shore.

sentences.chinese: 1931年，亚历山大港斯丹利海滨的游客们。

sentences.english: That seaside hotel charges exorbitant prices during the summer holidays.
sentences.chinese: 那家海滨旅馆在夏天休假期间漫天要价。

sentences.english: The seashore hotel charged the travelers $20 for a room for the night during the summer holiday.
sentences.chinese: 海滨旅馆在夏季假日期间每间房一夜就要20美元。

sentences.english: Every spring they migrate towards the coast.
sentences.chinese: 每年春季它们都向海滨移栖。

sentences.english: Thrill to the oceanfront finish on the Ernie Els golf course.
sentences.chinese: 令人兴奋的事上的海滨高尔夫球场埃尔斯完成。

sentences.english: I worked in a small beachside restaurant during the college vacation.
sentences.chinese: 学院放假时，我在海滨的一家小餐馆里打工。

sentences.english: It's a port for Capri and health and seaside resort on the Amalfi Coast.
sentences.chinese: 面对健康和卡普里岛和海滨度假的阿马尔菲海岸港口。

sentences.english: I'm standing in front of Louie's Seaside Restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我站在路易斯海滨饭店门前。

sentences.english: Weather permitting(=If weather permits), they will go on an outing to the beach tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 如果天气允许的话，他们将在明天组织一次海滨小游。

definition: Binhai (place name)/Binhai New District, subprovincial district of Tianjin/Binhai county in Yancheng 鹽城|盐城[Yan2 cheng2], Jiangsu/fictitious city Binhai in political satire/Primorsky, a territory in the far east of Russia
name of various places including Gold Coast (Australian city), Gold Coast (former British colony in Africa) and Costa Daurada (area on the coast of Catalonia, Spain)
Linhai county level city in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang
to overlook the sea/on the waterfront
